summary: 100% accurate coin replacer texture from the Roman Empire Era
descriptionHtml:
COIN: Aureus [Gold]
ERA/EMPEROR: Tiberius Julius Caesar Augustus (Reign: 14-37 AD) , one of Rome\'s greatest generals, conquering Pannonia, Dalmatia, Raetia, and temporarily Germania; laying the foundations for the northern frontier.

COIN: Sestertius [Silver]
ERA/EMPEROR: Titus Flavius Caesar Vespasianus Augustus  (Reign: 69-79 AD) , the founder of the Flavian dynasty, which ruled the Empire for a quarter century. 

COIN: Denarius [Bronze]
ERA/EMPEROR: Tiberius Claudius Caesar Augustus Germanicus (Reign: 41-54 AD) , an ambitious builder, constructing many new roads, aqueducts, and canals across the Empire. During his reign the Empire conquered Thrace, Noricum, Pamphylia, Lycia and Judaea, and began the conquest of Britain.

Each pack contains textures + Custom Bump maps
Coin01.dds is Gold, 02 is Silver and 03 is Bronze...

NOTE: The game only uses 1 texture for the coins [coin01.dds], sadly i dont have the knowledge needed in order to force it to mix and match 3 textures..

Version notes:
2.0 Corrected colours for both packs
1.1 Added pack of recolours from one coin
1.0 initial release

To do: 
Further correct colours

*****************************************************************************
Using the Nexus Mod Manager is highly recommended.
*****************************************************************************

Manual Install:
Extract the archive in your Skyrim Installation folder

Manual Uninstall:
Delete the files coin01 to 03.dds & coin01_n to 03_n.dds  from ../Data/textures/clutter

****************************************************************************
Redistribution with or without further editing is prohibited without my prior consent.
*****************************************************************************
